description.no: Gruppeleiar for kursa Innføring i programmering (INF100), Objekt-orientert programmering (INF101) og Algoritmar, datastrukturar og programmering (INF102).
description.en: Group session leader for the courses Introduction to programming (INF100), Object-oriented programming (INF101) and Algorithms, Data Structures and Programming (INF102).

description.no: Under mi tid hos Havyard bidrog eg med bl.a. drift og oppgradering av alle datasystem, support for ein aukande brukarmasse og feilsøking av prosessar i alle ledd.
description.en: In my time at Havyard, I contribute with among others drifting and upgrading of all computer systems, support for a growing user base, and troubleshooting of processes at all levels.

title.en: Representative for residents in Hyllestad Bustadstifting
Private in the compulsory military service for the Norwegian army
